body_content.explanation: to change the sounds and speech on a film or television programme for a second, third, etc. time, especially to a different language:
examples: I think they probably redubbed the lines because the actor had a croaky voice or something.
They also wanted to re-dub the film so everyone had American accents.

body_content.explanation: to give something or someone a new or different name from the one it or they had previously:
examples: The network was informed that "nuclear waste" had to be redubbed "hazardous material."
She redubbed the restaurant Casa Luis in honor of the former chef.
